name: Gohdil: Legend of the Ferrum
description:
This is an entry to the 2020 GMTK GameJam

Follow Gohdil, a simple fisherman sent on an epic quest by the king, to find the magic sword, called The Ferrum. On his way Gohdil has to battle the guardians, evil creatures which cannot be killed by normal means. Slaying them with a sword will cause them to split into two, but until they reform they are no threat.

Find the Ferrum at the Cairn of Tumulus to slay them once and for all.

Move — W A S D

Attack — Left Click or Space

Gohdil: Legend of the Ferrum includes dynamic music, voice acted intro and a horde of enemies that will go OUT OF CONTROL!

Comment if you found the hot dogs!
